item.title: WFCA
item.description: The Wisconsin Finishing Contractors Association is Wisconsin's premier association of finishing contractors. WFCA members strive to provide their clients with the highest quality workmanship through market based competitive bids in all areas of the finishing disciplines.

item.title: Contractors
item.description: Contractors who are partnered with the Wisconsin Finishing Contractors Association

item.title: Safety & Drug Program
item.description: Jobsite safety begins by selecting a WFCA contractor. WFCA has created an effective and in depth safety program.

item.title: Training & Education
item.description: WFCA contractors lead the industry in providing mandatory upgrade training, state approved apprenticeships and job specific training required to provide top ...

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: WFCA members uphold a stringent code of conduct to insure their customers receive consistent, industry leading results.

item.title: Who Is
item.description: WFCA gathers monthly to discuss and review a wide range of industry topics. From safety training and drug testing to risk management and new legislation

item.title: Contact
item.description: The Wisconsin Finishing Contractors Association is Wisconsin's premier association of finishing contractors. WFCA members strive to provide their clients with the highest quality workmanship through market based competitive bids in all areas of the finishing disciplines.
